member.name: M:CustomControls.CollectionEditor.CustomCollectionEditorForm.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: M:CustomControls.CollectionEditor.CustomCollectionEditorForm.GetItemType(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Gets the data type of each item in the collection.
member.param: The collection for which to get the item's type
member.returns: The data type of the collection items.

member.name: M:CustomControls.CollectionEditor.CustomCollectionEditorForm.CreateNewItemTypes(System.Collections.IList)
member.summary: Gets the data types that this collection editor can contain
member.param: The collection for which to return the available types
member.returns: An array of data types that this collection can contain.

member.name: M:CustomControls.CollectionEditor.CustomCollectionEditorForm.CreateInstance(System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the specified collection item type.
member.param: The type of item to create.
member.returns: A new instance of the specified object.

member.name: M:CustomControls.CollectionEditor.CustomCollectionEditorForm.DestroyInstance(System.Object)
member.summary: Destroys the specified instance of the object.

member.name: M:CustomControls.CollectionEditor.CustomCollectionEditorForm.CreateTItem(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a new TItem objectfor a collection item.
member.param: The collection item for wich to create an TItem object.
member.returns: A TItem object referencing the collection item received as parameter.

member.name: M:CustomControls.CollectionEditor.CustomCollectionEditorForm.SetProperties(CustomControls.CollectionEditor.TItem,System.Object)
member.summary: When implemented by a class, customize a TItem object in respect to it's corresponding collection item.
member.param: The TItem object to be customized in respect to it's corresponding collection item.
The collection item for which it customizes the TItem object.

member.name: M:CustomControls.CollectionEditor.CustomCollectionEditorForm.SetDisplayName(CustomControls.CollectionEditor.TItem)
member.summary: Sets the Name for a TItem object.
member.param: The TItem object for which to set the Name.
